snippet.title: Thymesia | Partnership Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready: https://thymesia.info/
Wishlist on Steam: http://bit.ly/ThymesiaSteam
Follow Thymesia on Twitter: https://twitter.com/OverBorderGames

Step out of the darkness and into a mysterious world ravaged by plague - This is Thymesia!

As Corvus you have the unique ability to rend the diseased powers of your enemies from them and fashion them into powerful weapons to use in visceral, fast-paced melee combat. 

Combine ferocious abilities, perfectly timed parries and dynamic dodges to strike down unforgiving enemies.

Key Features: 

• Weaponising diseases: As Corvus, players can seize diseases from enemies and wield them as deadly weapons

• Engaging combat: Players will need to use their entire arsenal to avoid death; dodging attacks and parrying at precisely the right time will be instrumental to survival

• A dark and deadly world: With a sinister and gloomy backdrop, Thymesia oozes character through its environments and setting

• Unforgiving enemies: Corrupted by the plague, and mutated into monsters, the enemies are twisted and incredibly hostile, challenging players at every turn

• Replayability: The ability to customise Corvus and try different builds, coupled with the multiple different endings available, means no two playthroughs are ever the same.



Like Thymesia on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OverBorderSt... 

Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/ 

About Team17 Digital Ltd Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Blasphemous, The Escapists, Moving Out, Overcooked, Neon Abyss, Going Under, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info.
